location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:195 x 328 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Hand drawn rough sketch plan attached to a report on customs control at Sur (folios 74-87) showing the position of the proposed fortified customs post and a building of the new custom house on the shore of the Khor Sur at Bathah. Location of fresh water source marked.
